巴黎一棟大樓當地時間周六（26日）下午，一名4歲男童懸吊在陽台外，法國巴黎黑人男子加薩瑪（Mamoudou Gassama）不顧危險奮勇徒手攀爬上4樓，於短短30秒內救起該名男童，身手有如蜘蛛俠，獲網民激讚。

事發於巴黎18區，當時男童父親疑外出購物，將兒子獨留家中，不料男童爬到陽台上，全身懸在大廈單位外，僅用雙手支撐。一位鄰居欲把他拉回，可是距離太遠，未能成功。22歲加薩瑪（Mamoudou Gassama）剛好路過見狀，挺身而出，敏捷地爬上4樓，只花了約30秒，他一手捉緊男童的手，將他送回屋內，現場圍觀民眾隨即響起如雷掌聲，英勇表現彷彿真人版的「蜘蛛俠」。

目擊者拍下驚險救人畫面上傳網絡，獲得網友一致讚賞，巴黎市長也致電肯定加薩瑪的義行，並在Twitter發布這項英勇事件，到巴黎才6個月的加薩瑪則說「我做到了，因為它是一個孩子」。

事件中男童指甲斷裂，加薩瑪則被刮傷均無大礙。警方與消防隊員隨後趕到，將追查男童的父母是否有疏忽照顧。

replies.msg:
https://tw.news.yahoo.com/%E5%AD%B8%E7%94%9F%E9%81%AD%E9%9B%BB%E8%BB%8A%E6%92%9E%E6%93%8A-%E7%AB%9F%E5%B0%B1%E6%AD%A4-%E4%BA%BA%E9%96%93%E8%92%B8%E7%99%BC-141514478.html

日本近日發生一起詭異事故，一名男學生疑似遭到JR列車撞到，而車站調閱監視器後也發現確實有撞到人，但工作人員在現場卻完全沒有發現這名男同學，就連月台、附近醫院都沒有查詢到男同學的蹤跡，憑空消失的怪事連警方也傻眼。



據《IBC岩手放送》報導，位於岩手縣的JR北上站於23日早上6時許，向警方通報有電車撞到學生的事故，警方調閱監視器後，確實發現有一名身穿校服的男子，遭到電車擦撞，然而警方既沒有在月台發現男同學蹤影，也沒有接獲任何受傷的通報，就連醫院也沒有記錄。

而這起「憑空消失」的擦撞事故，也影響了JR東北本線、北上線的電車停駛約1小時，警方雖然已將男子消失及擦撞事故列案調查，但日本網友紛紛表示「穿越時空了嗎」、「有制服的話，應該可以向學校查證吧」、「先公開監視器畫面再說」。

據《IBC岩手放送》報導，位於岩手縣的JR北上站於23日早上6時許，向警方通報有電車撞到學生的事故，警方調閱監視器後，確實發現有一名身穿校服的男子，遭到電車擦撞，然而警方既沒有在月台發現男同學蹤影，也沒有接獲任何受傷的通報，就連醫院也沒有記錄。

而這起「憑空消失」的擦撞事故，也影響了JR東北本線、北上線的電車停駛約1小時，警方雖然已將男子消失及擦撞事故列案調查，但日本網友紛紛表示「穿越時空了嗎」、「有制服的話，應該可以向學校查證吧」、「先公開監視器畫面再說」。

熱力難擋，就連來自非洲東部、抗熱力較強的肯尼亞旅客也指香港天氣熱，坦言：「香港好熱，我的兒子都大汗淋漓」(Hong Kong is very hot，and my son is sweat.)

來自越南的旅客則認為香港「熱力」程度可接受，但有感本港多個大型商場冷氣大，以致室內外溫差相距甚大，需要隨身帶備外套，以免旅遊期間生病。

本作將沒有與野生寶可夢之間的戰鬥
但玩家還是能與其他訓練家對戰
能夠選擇伊布的原因是因為當時精靈寶可夢：皮卡丘版的勁敵所使用的寶可夢就是伊布。加上伊布已經深受玩家愛戴很多年了，因此才決定成為本作最初能夠選擇的夥伴。
於預告片中有提到一隻新的特殊寶可夢，玩家只要將let'Go 系列連動至寶可夢GO，玩家即可在寶可夢GO中遇到這支全新的特殊寶可夢。
玩家仍舊可以與其他玩家戰鬥與交換寶可夢，但需要多台NS主機。
The Pokemon Company 認為 NS 主機是一部結合家用/攜帶等主機特性的遊戲主機，因此他們想將掌上型的優勢應用於 NS 上。
本作是專為家用型主機所設計的遊戲作品，而2019年推出的新作將更重視在攜帶方面的設計上。
The Pokemon Company 尚未公佈本作與 GO連動後的介面以及應用玩法。
但有同時遊玩 let'Go 與 GO 的玩家將會獲得相關獎勵。
The Pokemon Company 希望能透過 let'Go 吸引GO 的玩家，這也是為何遊戲內的寶可夢與捕捉介面會那麼的類似寶可夢 GO。
除了 let'Go 與 GO 之外，The Pokemon Company 將PokeBall Plus 視為 Pokemon Go Plus 的新世代商品。
Pokeball Plus 在製作過程中有任天堂協助參與。
Pokeball Plus 誕生的原因是希望能夠打造出一個現實世界的精靈球，並且裡面真的能帶著一隻寶可夢。
NS 主機與 Pokeball Plus 是透過藍牙傳輸連動。

replies.msg: 消息人士透露，兩幅連續牆在2015年中建成後，牆身上有約5,000個螺絲頭有移位、破損或內部被石屎填封等問題，無法與鋼筋接駁扭緊。據了解，承建商禮頓一直未有處理所有問題螺絲頭，有人反而安排工人將鋼筋的螺絲紋末端剪短，再強行「插入」有問題的螺絲頭，假裝已成功接駁。正常情況下，鋼筋與螺絲頭扭緊後，兩者接駁位深約10厘米；部份被剪短的鋼筋，與螺絲頭的接駁位僅不足1厘米。

replies.msg:
If the stories from RMC are correct, then Javi Garcia will become Arsenal’s new goalkeeping coach, working with Unai Emery again after spells with him at Sevilla and PSG.

There’s a vacancy at the moment because long-time coach Gerry Peyton was let go when Arsene Wenger left the club earlier this month, and it’s an area that has needed attention for some time anyway.

The Spaniard also has Premier League experience, having worked for a time at Swansea City, and there’s also a vague Arsenal connection because one of the players he coached there was former Gunner Lukasz Fabianski.

In 2014, as he prepared for his first full season with the club, the Polish international said, “I must say I’m really enjoying the work I’m doing with Javier.


“He is very organised and prepared, and his sessions are interesting and exciting – every day has something new.

“It is very important for us goalkeepers, especially at Swansea, to play well with our feet and start things from the back.

“So everything we have been doing in training with Javier is helping us improve on that area.”

Garcia spent 12 months with Swansea before returning to Spain, and he was replaced there by former Arsenal goalkeeping coach Tony Roberts whose YouTube/Twitter are well worth a follow as he often posts very interesting videos of his sessions.

“So everything we have been doing in training with Javier is helping us improve on that area.”

Garcia spent 12 months with Swansea before returning to Spain, and he was replaced there by former Arsenal goalkeeping coach Tony Roberts whose YouTube/Twitter are well worth a follow as he often posts very interesting videos of his sessions.

replies.msg:
Man City: Premier League champions close to signing Riyad Mahrez and Jorginho
By Simon Stone

BBC Sport

Manchester City are hopeful of completing the double signing of Leicester winger Riyad Mahrez and Napoli midfielder Jorginho by the end of next week.

Mahrez will cost around £60m with Jorginho's fee anticipated to be £42m.

In January, City walked away from a potential deal for Mahrez because they were put off by Leicester's valuation.

It sparked a dispute between the 27-year-old and Leicester, with the player handing in a transfer request.

Algerian Mahrez joined from French side Le Havre in 2014 and has scored 48 goals in 179 appearances for the Foxes.

He was named PFA Players' Player of the Year as Leicester won the Premier League in 2016.

Italy international Jorginho, 26, signed for Napoli in 2014 and made 36 appearances for the Serie A side last season, scoring against City in the Champions League in November.

Both players will be absent from this summer's World Cup after their nations failed to qualify for the tournament in Russia.

replies.msg:
Arsenal distance themselves from Unai Emery break clause claim

Arsenal have distanced themselves from claims new head coach Unai Emery has a break clause in his contract.

It was reported this morning that the Gunners have the option to remove the Spaniard at no cost after two years at the helm, giving the club some additional protection should Emery fall short of expectations.

However, when contacted by Standard Sport this morning, an Arsenal spokesman insisted he was “not aware” of any such clause, although the suggestion was not completely denied.

Chief executive Ivan Gazidis was adamant Arsenal’s rigorous recruitment process to find Arsene Wenger’s successor had ended by finding the perfect candidate.

Speaking at Emery’s unveiling last month, Gazidis said: “This kind of significant change in a club doesn’t deliver instant success. Nobody is naive enough to think that.

“But I do think the new way of working, the new energy... It’s not a criticism of Arsene, I just think that change stimulates the environment and I think it’s going to be very positive.

“I could not possibly feel better about this appointment. And the feeling that we have between each other - and we’ve spent a lot of time over the last few days together — is I feel better and better about it by the hour.”

Arsenal are closing in on a deal for Borussia Dortmund defender Sokratis Papastathopoulos. Stephan Lichtsteiner is also set to sign on a free transfer from Juventus while Paris Saint-Germain youngster Yacine Adli is another target.
